name: Jellystake
description: A staking service for JLY tokens on DMC, part of the Jellyverse ecosystem.
longDescription: Jellystake, part of the Jellyverse ecosystem, is a staking algorithm/service designed for the JLY token on DeFiChain. It aims to provide a secure and efficient way for token holders to stake their JLY tokens and earn rewards, thereby encouraging long-term holding and ecosystem participation.

name: Jellyswap
description: A decentralized exchange on DMC, part of the Jellyverse ecosystem.
longDescription: Jellyswap is another key component of the Jellyverse ecosystem, serving as a decentralized exchange (DEX) on DeFiChain. It aims to provide a secure, efficient, and user-friendly platform for trading various digital assets in a decentralized manner, thereby enhancing liquidity and user engagement within the DeFiChain ecosystem.

name: jUSD stablecoin
description: A decentralized stablecoin on DMC, part of the Jellyverse ecosystem.
longDescription: jUSD is a decentralized stablecoin that is part of the Jellyverse ecosystem and operates on the DeFiChain platform. It aims to provide a stable, secure, and decentralized medium of exchange that maintains a 1:1 peg with the US Dollar. By offering a stablecoin option within the DeFiChain ecosystem, jUSD aims to facilitate smoother transactions and provide a safe haven asset for users.

name: Jellybond
description: A decentralized bonding mechanism on DMC, part of the Jellyverse ecosystem.
longDescription: Jellybond is a decentralized bonding mechanism that forms part of the Jellyverse ecosystem on DeFiChain. It aims to provide a secure and efficient way for users to bond assets, thereby facilitating more complex financial operations like loans, collateralization, and yield generation within the DeFiChain ecosystem.

name: Vanilla Labs
description: TODO
longDescription: TODO

name: Vanilla Swap
description: A decentralized exchange on DMC, enabling seamless asset swaps.
longDescription: Vanilla Swap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on the DeFiChain ecosystem. It provides a platform for users to swap various digital assets in a secure and decentralized manner. By eliminating the need for intermediaries, Vanilla Swap aims to offer a more transparent and efficient trading experience.

name: Vanilla Farm
description: TODO
longDescription: TODO

name: dSEA
description: An NFT marketplace on DMC, facilitating the trade of unique digital assets.
longDescription: dSEA is an NFT marketplace designed to facilitate the trading of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) within the DeFiChain ecosystem. It serves as a platform where users can buy, sell, and trade unique digital assets in a secure and decentralized manner. By leveraging DeFiChain's blockchain technology, dSEA aims to provide a seamless and trustworthy experience for NFT enthusiasts.

name: Testnet explorer
description: A block explorer on the DMC testnet, offering insights into addresses, transactions, and smart contracts.
longDescription: The DMC Testnet Explorer serves as an indispensable tool for both developers and users within the DeFiChain ecosystem. It allows for the inspection of addresses, transactions, blocks, and smart contracts on DeFiChain's testnet. By providing a user-friendly interface and a wide array of features, the explorer acts as a central hub for anyone seeking detailed information about activities on the testnet.

name: DMC testnet DFI faucet
description: A faucet providing free DMC testnet DFI tokens, available for request every 6 hours.
longDescription: The DMC Testnet DFI Faucet is a valuable resource for developers and users who are looking to experiment with DeFiChain's testnet. The faucet provides free DMC testnet DFI tokens, which can be requested every 6 hours. This enables users to play around with the testnet, build applications, and test smart contracts without any financial risk.

name: OpenDApps Cloud
description: A Software-as-a-Service platform, providing solutions for crypto projects.
longDescription: OpenDApps Cloud is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform that specializes in providing solutions for crypto projects. It aims to streamline the development, deployment, and management of decentralized applications by offering a range of cloud-based services. By doing so, OpenDApps Cloud seeks to lower the barriers to entry for crypto projects and accelerate their time-to-market.

name: DeFiChain Domains
description: A platform offering decentralized domains on DeFiChain.
longDescription: DeFiChain Domains aims to revolutionize the domain name system by offering decentralized domains on the DeFiChain platform. By doing so, it provides users with the ability to have more control over their online identities, free from the constraints of traditional, centralized domain registrars. This initiative seeks to enhance privacy, security, and user autonomy within the DeFiChain ecosystem.

name: DeFi-Bets Games
description: A betting platform on DMC, allowing wagers on future asset prices.
longDescription: DeFi-Bets is a platform that allows users to bet on future asset prices within the DeFiChain ecosystem. By leveraging blockchain technology, DeFi-Bets aims to provide a transparent, secure, and decentralized environment for financial speculation. The platform seeks to attract traders and speculators who are interested in profiting from price movements without the need for asset ownership.

name: Winner takes it all
description: A gambling smart contract on DMC, designed to burn coins.
longDescription: Winner Takes it All is a gambling smart contract designed to burn coins, with plans to later support dUSD. The platform aims to provide a decentralized and transparent environment for gambling activities. By burning coins, it also serves the dual purpose of reducing the overall supply, potentially increasing scarcity and value for the remaining tokens.

name: Wrytes
description: An on-chain decentralized platform for options trading.
longDescription: Wrytes is an on-chain decentralized platform focused on options trading. It aims to provide a secure, transparent, and efficient environment for trading financial derivatives within the DeFiChain ecosystem. By leveraging blockchain technology, Wrytes seeks to democratize access to options trading and reduce the complexities traditionally associated with these financial instruments.

name: DeFiChain Punks
description: An NFT project on DMC, offering unique, algorithmically generated characters.
longDescription: DeFiChain Punks is an NFT (Non-Fungible Token) project on the DeFiChain platform. It offers a collection of unique, algorithmically generated characters as NFTs. These digital collectibles aim to provide both aesthetic value and potential investment opportunities. By leveraging the DeFiChain ecosystem, DeFiChain Punks seeks to offer a secure and decentralized platform for NFT enthusiasts.

name: Nucocloud
description: Your launchpad to personalized, unlimited & decentralized computing power.
longDescription: nuco.cloud aims to be your launchpad to personalized, unlimited, and decentralized computing power. The platform seeks to democratize access to computing resources by offering a decentralized cloud computing solution. By leveraging blockchain technology, nuco.cloud aims to provide a secure, efficient, and scalable platform for various computing needs.

name: Unleashed
description: A software solution provider for decentralized companies.
longDescription: Unleashed focuses on building software solutions specifically tailored for decentralized companies. By leveraging blockchain technology, the project aims to provide robust, secure, and scalable software solutions that meet the unique needs of companies operating in a decentralized environment. Unleashed seeks to bridge the gap between traditional software and the evolving landscape of decentralized business models.

name: Decentralized-Crypto-Casino
description: A decentralized roulette platform on DMC, using DFI tokens for play.
longDescription: Decentralized-Crypto-Casino is a platform that offers decentralized roulette gaming, allowing users to play with DFI tokens. The project aims to provide a secure, transparent, and fair gaming experience by leveraging blockchain technology. By doing so, it seeks to eliminate the need for intermediaries and offer a more direct and engaging gaming experience.

name: DeFiChain Lottery
description: A decentralized lottery on DMC, operated via smart contracts.
longDescription: DeFiChain Lottery is a decentralized lottery platform that operates on the DeFiChain platform. Utilizing smart contracts, the project aims to provide a secure, transparent, and fair lottery experience. By leveraging blockchain technology, DeFiChain Lottery seeks to eliminate the need for intermediaries, thereby offering a more direct and engaging gaming experience.

name: Million Pixel DFI
description: A digital canvas where pixels can be bought via smart contracts.
longDescription: Million Pixel DFI is a unique project that allows users to buy pixels of a one-million-pixel picture via smart contracts. The project aims to create a digital canvas where each pixel can be owned, thereby offering a new form of digital real estate. By leveraging blockchain technology, Million Pixel DFI provides a secure and transparent platform for this novel concept.

name: JAVLIS / JAVsphere
description: A dual-platform offering both centralized and decentralized financial products.
longDescription: JAVLIS is a centralized finance platform designed to offer a user-friendly solution for individuals looking to invest fiat currencies into cryptocurrencies. It aims to generate passive income through the dynamics of DeFi. On the other hand, JAVsphere is a decentralized suite of products in the DeFi space, offering a unique set of products and functions. Together, they aim to provide a comprehensive financial solution for both centralized and decentralized finance.

name: Black Swan
description: A project in collaboration with Jellyverse, with details to be announced.
longDescription: Black Swan is a project that is currently in collaboration with Jellyverse. While specific details about the project are yet to be announced, it is expected to contribute to the DeFi space in a meaningful way. More information will be released soon, and it's advisable to keep an eye on official channels for updates.

name: Metalabs
description: Not yet confirmed what this project is about.

name: Crypto Factor
description: A platform aiming to create self-contained digital entities for a future Metaverse.
longDescription: Crypto Factor is a visionary project that aims to leverage decentralized services on DeFiMetaChain. The project focuses on the creation of self-contained digital entities designed to operate in a future Metaverse. These entities are intended to generate revenue and income through novel features, exchange digital value, derive utility, interact by proxy on digital media, and interface directly with tokenized assets. The ultimate goal is to provide control and versatility through the ownership of these digital entities, thereby constituting real operations.

name: ebox
description: Innovative Solutions – Reversible Transactions, 100% DeFi OTC
longDescription:
ebox provides services and solutions with a unique character, bringing straight-forward innovation and usability to end users and businesses alike.
With the spirit of community embedded deep within our hearts and vision of the project, having our roots within the trader, investor & enthusiast community ourselves, we understand the needs of our audience, and adjust dynamically to any challenges along our journey.
The ebox On-Chain Escrow offers an unprecedented level of comfort and safety in everyday crypto life through reversible transactions and 100% DeFi OTC trading.
